name: SHIELD
description: Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement, and Logistics Division

name: Nova Corps
description: A group of intergalactic police officers empowered by the Nova Force

name: SWORD
description: Sentient Weapon Observation and Response Division

name: The Watchers
description: Non-interference beings who observe the events of the universe

name: The Celestials
description: Ancient cosmic entities with immense power and influence

name: The Brood
description: An insectoid alien race often in conflict with the X-Men

name: The Guardians of the Galaxy
description: A group of cosmic heroes who protect the universe from various threats

name: The Shiar Empire
description: A powerful alien empire with a vast interstellar territory

name: The Skrull Empire
description: Shapeshifting aliens engaged in a long-standing conflict with the Kree

name: The Kree Empire
description: An advanced militaristic alien race with a vast interstellar empire
